messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: You guys ever,like,just want a shitload of corgis instead of your normal crew?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. Your station has been given a free nanotrasen exploration vessel due to your station not becoming a clusterfuck for the past hour. It will dock in arrivals. Centcomm Out.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Centcomm reporting back, scratch that. The vessel has been eaten by a class 6 gravitationial singularity. We will find another way to reward you. Centcomm out.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Centcomm reporting in...AGIAN. We have a replacement for your exploration vessel. It isn't the raven battlecruiser, but it'll do. In other news, i just found out my wife is cheating on me. After this message, i will blow my brains out. Centcomm out.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed very low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Sorry about that. Someones toddler got onto the controls and accidentaly recalled your shuttle. We'll send it.
